A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson's brilliance revives this franchise for me. This movie truly made me love Star Wars with every fiber of my being. Visually stunning and intimate\, this movie made me feel like a true Star Wars movie should; hopeful and like I was a part of something bigger than myself. Packed full with symbolism and parallels\, in-depth character development\, and a moral to this story that resonates with people of all walks of life. Anyone can be a hero. \nI can't say enough about this film. Every time I watch it\, I find something new that I didn't notice before that enhances the story. It's tragic that some fans don't appreciate this movie for the creative genius it is.
